sec.p: Mistra supported this research through a core grant to the Stockholm Resilience Centre. J.-B.J. was supported by the Erling-Persson Foundation and the Swedish Research Council Formas (project no. 2015-743). The study was part of the Ocean Tipping Points project, funded by the Gordon and Betty Moore Foundation (grant no. 2897.01) and the NOAA Coral Reef Conservation Program (grant no. NA14NOS4820098).
